greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of the modulus of the fixed point of exp(z) in C congruent with the branch K=1 of log(z)+2*Pi*K*i.
comment: Modulus of z_3 = A277681 + i*A277682. See A277681 for more information.
link: Stanislav Sykora, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2000
Stanislav Sykora, Fixed points of the mappings exp(z) and -exp(z) in C, 2016.
xref: Fixed points of +exp(z): z_1: A059526, A059527, A238274, and z_3: A277681 (real part), A277682 (imaginary part).
Fixed points of -exp(z): z_0: A030178, and z_2: A276759, A276760, A276761.
results.author: _Stanislav Sykora_, Nov 12 2016
